SETS.NODES: Total number of nodes in the octagonal grid
SETS.EDGES: Total number of edges in the octagonal grid

PARAMETERS.name: L_E
PARAMETERS.query: Unit length of a grid edge

OBJECTIVE.query: Minimize sum(path_i_length + W * path_i_turn_count) for i in [1, N]

CONSTRAINTS.name: Path_Disjointness
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: For all i, j in [1, N], i!= j, x_i^{	ext{start}}!= x_j^{	ext{start}} and x_i^{	ext{end}}!= x_j^{	ext{end}}

CONSTRAINTS.name: Non_Crossing
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: For all i, j in [1, N], i!= j, x_i^{	ext{start}}!= x_j^{	ext{end}} and x_i^{	ext{end}}!= x_j^{	ext{start}}

CONSTRAINTS.name: Movement_Limitations
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: For all i, j in [1, N], i!= j, l_i <= l_e and t_i <= 1
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \forall i, j \in [1, N], i \neq j, \quad l_i \leq l_e \land t_i \leq 1

CONSTRAINTS.name: Curvature_Constraint
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: For all i, j in [1, N], i!= j, t_i <= 1
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \forall i, j \in [1, N], i \neq j, \quad t_i \leq 1

CONSTRAINTS.name: Minimum_Perpendicular_Distance
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: For all i, j in [1, N], i!= j, \sqrt{(x_i^{	ext{end}} - x_j^{	ext{end}})^2 + (x_i^{	ext{start}} - x_j^{	ext{start}})^2} >= \frac{l_e \sqrt{2}}{2}
